profile.intro: I'm Maksim, a passionate developer with a constantly evolving story.
profile.background: After graduating from Ironhack a year ago, where I completed an intensive web development bootcamp, I decided to continue my learning at 42 Barcelona.
profile.current: Currently, I continue my studies at 42 Barcelona, where I dive deep into advanced concepts such as C, C++, Linux systems, relational databases, and developing command-line skills in various environments.
profile.skills: In addition to my focus on these technical areas, I practice both frontend and backend development with JavaScript, and I take additional courses in software quality (QA) to improve my testing skills and ensure I deliver robust and reliable code.
profile.collaboration: I constantly seek to stay updated with the latest technologies and collaborate on diverse projects, applying my knowledge in different contexts.
profile.future: My passion for learning and my desire to apply what I have learned drive me to keep growing every day.
profile.goal: I am excited about the opportunities the future holds for me in the development world.
